text: Yemwe abemeye! Ntimukangize amaturo yanyu kubera incyuro n’inabi, nka wa wundi utanga umutungo we kugira ngo yiyereke abantu, ntanemere Allah n’umunsi w’imperuka. Bityo urugero rwe ni nk’urutare rworosheho itaka, nuko imvura nyinshi yarugwaho ikarusiga rwanamye. Nta cyo bashobora guhemberwa mu byo bakoze, kandi Allah ntayobora abantu b’abahakanyi
